text: John Joseph Corbett (born May 9, 1961) is an American actor and country music singer. He is known for his roles as Chris Stevens on CBS' Northern Exposure and as Aidan Shaw on HBO's Sex and the City. Corbett also played Ian Miller, in the romantic comedy movie My Big Fat Greek Wedding (2002) and its 2016 sequel. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American country singers Category:American country guitarists Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from West Virginia Category:Musicians from West Virginia Category:Singers from West Virginia Category:People from Wheeling, West Virginia
title: John Corbett
